LanguageData.PathingNonHumanToggleLabel: Enable instant movement for colony non-humans
LanguageData.PathingAllyToggleLabel: Enable instant movement for allied pawns
LanguageData.IgnoreTerrainCostToggleLabel: Enable colonists to ignore terrain cost
LanguageData.IgnoreTerrainCostNonHumanToggleLabel: Enable colony non-humans to ignore terrain cost
LanguageData.WorkSpeedToggleLabel: Enable work speed multiplier for colonists
LanguageData.LearningSpeedToggleLabel: Enable learning speed multiplier for colonists
LanguageData.ToilSpeedToggleLabel: Enable general toil speed multiplier for colonists
LanguageData.CarryingCapacityToggleLabel: Enable carrying capacity multiplier for colonists
LanguageData.CarryingCapacityMassToggleLabel: Enable carrying capacity affecting caravan capacity
